sentences.en: 10 is the radix of the decimal system

sentences.cn: 有黄苓 、 柴胡 、 知母 、 甘草等13种野生药材.

sentences.en: Objective : To identify whether Radix Bupleuri ( Bupleurum chinense ) was fumed with sulfur.
sentences.cn: 目的: 鉴别市售柴胡是否用硫黄熏制.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the pharmacological action of active composition of Radix Saposhnikoviae.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察防风有效部位药理作用.

sentences.en: Objective : To optimize the preparation procedure of Suppositoria Radix Bupleuri for Kids.
sentences.cn: 目的: 优选小儿柴胡栓的制备工艺.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the fingerprint of Radix Salviae Miltiorrhizae of Xiangdan Injection.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究香丹注射剂、原药材的指纹图谱.

sentences.en: Objective To determine the content of trigonelline in Radix Mirabilis.
sentences.cn: 目的测定紫茉莉根中葫芦巴碱的含量.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To establish a bacterial endotoxin test for Radix Salvia Miltiorrhiza injection.
sentences.cn: 目的:建立丹参注射液细菌内毒素检查方法.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the chronic toxicity of Compound Radix Angelicae Dahuricae capsule.
sentences.cn: 目的考察复方白芷胶囊的长期毒性.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To optimize the extraction technology of steaming Radix Scrophulariae.
sentences.cn: 目的选择蒸玄参的提取工艺.

sentences.en: Pertaining to a fixed radix numeration system , having a radix of twelve.
sentences.cn: 以10为基数的固定基数记数表示系统.

sentences.en: Pertaining to a fixed radix numeration system having a radix of two.
sentences.cn: 用来修饰或说明以2为基数的一种固定基数记数系统.

sentences.en: Results: Radix Scutellariae and Flos Lonicerae could be identified by TLC.
sentences.cn: 结果: 薄层色谱中能检测出黄芩和金银花.

sentences.en: The exogenous enzymes could significantly improve the qualities of Radix ginseng extract.
sentences.cn: 外源酶可提高人参的浸出率.

sentences.en: The radix complement in the pure binary numeration system.
sentences.cn: 纯二进制记数系统中的基数补码.

trans.tran_en: any number that is the base of a number system or of a system of logarithms
